channel.title: Disneypi on Erica Ram
channel.description: Recent content in Disneypi on Erica Ram

item.title: Day One: Disney Beginnings
item.description: Today was my first day as a Disney Professional Intern. I attended Disney Beginnings at the Walt Disney Studio Lot in Burbank, CA. All the interns gathered in Legends Plaza, and then proceeded to a conference room in the Frank G. Wells building. The presentation went over Disney heritage, information about organizational structure, what will be expected of us as interns, and an overview of how to use the online hub.
